Rodimus:

"I really apreciate your honestity, Silence"said the male while h=
e typed a buton and the door closed and he sat down"We don't know why this =
happened until your mermories are restored, but I guess that something happ=
ened that made you hate Decepticons and co... But that isn't the point"said=
 kindly the male"When I received him, I got the waranty of his sister, that=
 he didn't come with bad intentions and his brother is of one of my best wa=
rriors; both,Organics and Malice, are  maximals and pretty loyal to MAximal=
 'cause... and if he had bad intentions.. he may not openly told me all his=
 story and he had changed to a less... Decepticon-like appearance; he, also=
 has moved far a way of  the areas that I know are important for MAximal's =
base defence and I don't recive a report that anyone had done an attemp to =
do an non-autorized entrance...  "

Rodimus thought a while and added camly=
 "Silence, the most important for us is keep peace amoun our ranks..."
  --=
--- Original Message ----- 
  From: Dark Mouse 
  To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
  Sent: Thursday, April 21, 2005 10:22 PM
  Subject: Re: Silence



  Si=
lence::

  She notes tht so far, she was one of the littlest bots on base.
=
  Megatron towered over her. Rodimus too was more than twice her size. 
  S=
he sat down and sighed. "Eh, sir, I, ah, about earlier sir.....I
  seemed t=
o have misplaced my protocol chip. I lost my temper and forgot
  my place s=
ir."  She took a deep breath. "But, though I am not sure why
  yet, I will =
never trust a Deceptcon, predicon or any of the like. I'll
  follow orders =
sir, work beside them as you command. But I will never
  trust or like them=
 sir."  She looked down, "I just wanted to be honest
  with you sir."
